Lyric sent a message to Thor requesting a refund of the donation, under the pretense that “there seemed to be a technical issue at the time of the donation”.
The payment reversal was granted by PayPal.
"Always cool to see an $800 chargeback 212 days after a donation."
Thor mentions the chargeback on his Twitch stream.
Thor submits copyright takedowns against Lyric's YouTube channel.
